query: Can you help me find all unread emails from my project manager?
I need to draft an email to the team about our quarterly results, but I want to review it before sending
Can you pull up the email thread with the client from last week about the contract details?
I accidentally marked an important email as read. Is there a way to undo that?
I want to send a follow-up message to the conference speakers with their presentation details
Can you show me my latest unread emails from work?
I want to check my inbox and see the 10 most recent messages, including the full email content
Can you pull up the full email thread from last week about the marketing budget? I want to review the details.
Show me the complete contents of the email my manager sent yesterday with the project proposal - I need to check something specific.
I've already read this email from my boss. Can you clear the unread flag?
I've gone through the project update email. Please mark it as processed so it stops showing as new.
I accidentally read this email but want to come back to it later. Can you help me reset its status?
I just skimmed this message from my boss and want to make sure I review it thoroughly later. How can I flag it to review again?
I want to remove this spam email from my inbox. Can you help me get rid of it?
Please delete the email from my boss about the quarterly report - I accidentally saved it and don't need it anymore.
I want to move this important client email from my inbox to the Client Projects folder
Can you help me transfer the email about the quarterly report to my Archive folder?
Can you help me draft an email to my project manager about the quarterly report?
I need to send a quick message to the team about our meeting next week
Can you help me draft a response to the email from Sarah about the project timeline?
I want to send a quick reply to that customer support ticket I received earlier today
I want to save an email I'm working on for later. Can you help me draft something to my team about the quarterly report?
Need to write an email to Sarah about the project proposal, but I'm not ready to send it yet. Can you help me start a draft?
Can you help me find emails from my boss about the quarterly report from last month?
I need to track down some unread emails from Sarah that came in between 15-Jan-2024 and 22-Jan-2024
What folders do I have in my email account right now?
Can you show me all the different folders I've set up in my mailbox?
I'll check this email later when I have more time to draft a proper response.
Need to come back to this message - want to make sure I give it the attention it deserves when I'm not rushed.
I want to see all the emails I've set aside to respond to later
Can you pull up the list of messages I've marked to follow up on when I have more time?
I need to find all unread emails from my boss from the past week
Can you help me draft an email to the project team about our upcoming meeting?
I want to move some important client emails to a separate folder to organize them
I'm looking for an email I received last month about the quarterly budget - can you help me track it down?
I need to reply to that important message from HR but I'm not ready to send the response right now
Can you show me the unread emails in my inbox?
I want to check my recent emails from my colleague Sarah. Can you pull the last 10 messages from her?
I want to remove the blue dot/unread indicator from the email with ID 8f3a-4c9d-b2e1-7f5c
Find the email from my boss about the quarterly report and make sure it shows as new again so I don't forget to review it carefully
I want to get rid of that spam email from last week. The one with the weird subject line about crypto.
Can you remove the email from my boss about the canceled meeting? I don't need it cluttering up my inbox anymore.
I want to organize my inbox by moving this project update email to my Work folder
Can you help me shift this newsletter from my main inbox to the Newsletters folder? It's cluttering things up.
Need to send a quick message to sarah.johnson@company.com about the project deadline
I want to send a quick response to that email from marketing about the quarterly report
Hit reply and tell Sarah her proposal looks good, but we need to adjust the timeline
I want to save an email I'm working on for later - can you help me keep this as a draft?
Draft an email to sarah.marketing@company.com about the quarterly report, but don't send it yet. I'll review and send later.
Can you help me locate unread emails from marketing between January 1st and February 15th?
I'm trying to check what email directories I currently have set up. What folders are available in my mailbox?
I'll respond to this email later. Can you set a reminder for me?
This message needs a thoughtful reply, but I don't have time right now. Flag it so I can come back to it when I'm less busy.
I want to review all the emails I've set aside to respond to later this week
Show me the list of messages I've flagged to follow up on when I have more time
